How many people are affected by Meier-Gorlin syndrome ?,"Meier-Gorlin syndrome is a rare condition; however, its prevalence is unknown.",GHR,Meier-Gorlin syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Meier-Gorlin syndrome ?,"Meier-Gorlin syndrome can be caused by mutations in one of several genes. Ea
